column4: Hey. How would i rename all files in a directory via command line using back references and regex? It seems like "rename" isn't the right command for me...
Hmm... I'll play around with it
Like, heres a file for example: "01 Hulk Smash __ Pillow Angel.mp3" i want to get it into the format: "01-Hulk_Smash-Pillow_Angel.mp3"
which device gives the errors and when?
you may need to put it in a windows system and convent it to a non-dynamic partition
why is there no data backup by the user?
why ask that? Some people just don't use their computers right
well they have learned the value of backups
make sure the partitions aren't dynamic
the Windows parition? I'll check it out, but i'm pretty sure they're non expanding.
the more standard the partition is the better
